channel.title: You Have To Be A Genius To Figure Out This Run.bat Error... PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
So whenever I try to run the .bat file, errors keep coming up. I've done EVERYTHING! Downloaded newer Java versions, replaced all xstream jar files... Nothing seems to work. If anyone has any idea, PLEASE let me know! Run.Bat
@echo off title Source "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/* com.rs2.Server localhost 43594 600 pause
Then the Errors that come up are...
Starting live server! [9/6/12 11:11 PM]: Starting Scape on /127.0.0.1:43594... [9/6/12 11:11 PM]: Loading packets... [9/6/12 11:11 PM]: Loaded 63 packets. com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.StreamException: Cannot create XmlPullParser at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.AbstractXppDriver.createReader(AbstractXpp Driver.java:56) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.AbstractXppDriver.createReader(AbstractXpp Driver.java:65) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:922) at com.rs2.model.players.item.ItemDefinition.init(ItemDefinition.java:75) at com.rs2.util.XStreamUtil.loadAllFiles(XStreamUtil.java:55) at com.rs2.Server.run(Server.java:133) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [9/6/12 11:11 PM]: Saved all players. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: You Have To Be A Genius To Figure Out This Run.bat Error... PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Rs2-Remake Rs2-Remake
item.description:
@Rs2-Remake wrote:

Even after doing all that, I still get the error…

Read full topic

item.title: You Have To Be A Genius To Figure Out This Run.bat Error... PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Carter2 Carter_
item.description:
@Carter2 wrote:

Your xstream is out of date/too high for your current java/jdk version. You need to update your libs.

Read full topic

@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

find the main class. I believe it is Server.java. Open it, click the green play button at the top of the menu bar and it should run in a console window.
